label: EventElement
comment: Information about an event in which a Track and Trace (TT) element of one of more physical or digital objects is identified by a specific object class identifier (such as an electronic product class), either a specific quantity or an unspecified quantity.

datatypeProperties.comment: The identifier of the object class for this TT event element.

objectProperties.comment: A number of units for this supply chain event.

referencedBy.comment: A quantity event element specified for a child of this TT aggregation event.
A quantity event element specified for this TT object event.
A quantity event element specified for this TT object event.
A quantity event element specified for an input of this TT transformation event.
A quantity event element specified for an output of this TT transformation event.
